mapper.select: SELECT E.NAME, P.NAME AS POS_NO, D.NAME AS DEPT_NO FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN POSITION P ON E.POS_NO = P.NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.NO WHERE RESIGN_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT ( NO, TASK_NO, SENDER, TITLE, CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_REP_NO.NEXTVAL, #{taskNo}, #{sender}, #{title}, #{content} )
INSERT INTO REPORT_ATT ( NO, EMP_NO, REP_NO, TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_REP_ATT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, SEQ_REP_NO.CURRVAL, #{type} )
INSERT INTO REPORT_FILE ( NO, REP_NO, NAME, PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_REP_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_REP_NO.CURRVAL, #{name}, #{path} )
mapper.select: SELECT R.NO, R.TASK_NO, A.ATT_NAME, E.NAME AS SENDER, R.TITLE, R.CONTENT, R.ENROLL_DATE FROM REPORT R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.SENDER = E.NO JOIN ( SELECT A.REP_NO, LISTAGG(E.NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY E.NAME) AS ATT_NAME FROM REPORT_ATT A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.EMP_NO = E.NO WHERE A.TYPE = 'A' GROUP BY A.REP_NO ) A ON R.NO = A.REP_NO WHERE R.DEL = 'N' ORDER BY R.NO DESC

SELECT R.NO, E.NAME AS SENDER, D.NAME AS DEPT_NO, P.NAME AS POS_NAME, R.TITLE, R.CONTENT, R.ENROLL_DATE FROM REPORT R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.NO = R.SENDER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.NO = E.DEPT_NO JOIN POSITION P ON P.NO = E.POS_NO WHERE R.NO = #{no} AND R.DEL = 'N'

SELECT A.REP_NO, LISTAGG(CONCAT(CONCAT(E.NAME, ' '), P.NAME), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY E.NAME) AS EMP_NO, A.TYPE FROM REPORT_ATT A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.EMP_NO = E.NO JOIN POSITION P ON E.POS_NO = P.NO WHERE A.TYPE = 'A' AND A.REP_NO = #{no} GROUP BY A.REP_NO, A.TYPE

SELECT A.REP_NO, LISTAGG(CONCAT(CONCAT(E.NAME, ' '), P.NAME), ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY E.NAME) AS EMP_NO, A.TYPE FROM REPORT_ATT A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.EMP_NO = E.NO JOIN POSITION P ON E.POS_NO = P.NO WHERE A.TYPE = 'R' AND A.REP_NO = #{no} GROUP BY A.REP_NO, A.TYPE
SELECT NO, REP_NO, NAME, PATH FROM REPORT_FILE WHERE REP_NO = #{no}
SELECT NO, REP_NO, NAME, PATH FROM REP_FILE WHERE NO = #{no}
